"Flowers are the music of the ground. From earth’s lips, spoken without sound." – Edwin Curran

Welcome to Stockholm Floristry School


Stockholm Floristry School is a place where creativity and nature come together to inspire the next generation of floral designers. Founded with a passion for floristry, our school blends traditional techniques with modern trends, ensuring students gain both artistic and technical skills. With expert instructors, hands-on workshops, and a focus on sustainability, we provide a unique learning experience that nurtures creativity and craftsmanship. Whether you're a beginner or an aspiring professional, our courses offer the perfect environment to develop your talent and bring floral visions to life. Join us and be part of a community where flowers tell a story of beauty and innovation.

Courses & Programs

Weekend Florist

Weekend Florist is a hands-on course designed for beginners and hobbyists to learn essential floral arrangement techniques in a flexible weekend format. Guided by expert florists, you'll create stunning bouquets and designs while gaining practical skills in a supportive environment.

Winter Holiday Wreath & Garland

Winter Holiday Wreath & Garland is a seasonal course where you’ll learn to create beautiful holiday wreaths, centerpieces, and festive floral arrangements. This hands-on workshop will help you bring the magic of Christmas to life with natural elements, rich colors, and creative designs.

Wedding Flowers

Wedding Flowers is a specialized course designed to teach you how to create elegant floral arrangements for weddings. From stunning bridal bouquets to enchanting centerpieces, you'll learn essential techniques and design principles to bring any wedding vision to life.

Event Table Styling

This course focuses on designing elegant table settings for various events, from weddings to corporate gatherings. Students will learn how to combine tableware, centerpieces, and floral arrangements to create visually stunning and memorable tablescapes.
